Effective Questioning Techniques

- Know when to ask closed questions and when to ask open-ended questions 
 
- Break the habit of only making statements 

- Develop your own list of commonly asked questions - [[CommonlyAskedQuestionList]]
 
- Don’t be afraid to probe repeatedly

- 先用简单的问题给人家热身

- 用递进的方法 - (避免把问题问散了)

- 示弱，奉承，搭便车 refer to [[ExpressQuestion|如何提问]]   

- 授权 refer to [[ExpressDelegate|如何授权]]
